channel.title: git on Shohei's Spotaneous Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Shohei's Spotaneous Blog

item.title: Git Basics
item.description: $ git init to initialize a git repo. $ git config --list to show your git config. $ git add <file-name> to stage your file(s). $ git commit -m "<your-comment>" to make a commit. $ git push to save your work on your GitHub or GitLab or…? $ git status to show the current working repo’s status.
